tab1_text: Mapstories was created as a collaboration between re:edu GmbH & Co.KG and Vamos e.V. The starting point of the project was to conduct a co-creative lab on the global clothing industry. Mapstories is a web-based open-source tool that allows students to independently engage in development education on the aforementioned topic. The Mapstories can be used in the context of education for sustainable development, particularly due to their ability to visually establish systemic connections, providing a comprehensive view of global issues.
tab3_text: Call for support in the cooperative project
tab4_text: Do you want to showcase places or projects that promote social cohesion in the digital space and demonstrate how they are interconnected? And do you want to do it based on your own themes? We offer online training sessions for different target groups on how to use the platform. An initial introduction to the platform, its features, and developing your own ideas for the first story takes approximately 90 minutes. The costs vary depending on the context and complexity, ranging from 100€ to 250€. Inquiries to: mapstories@vamos-muenster.de
